timeline.message: feat(TBD-10921): Squash to backport to maintenance/7.3 (#1783)

fix(TDQ-18965): Support Spark3 Local for tKMeansModel and
tPredictCluster

fix(TDQ-18967): Support Spark3 Local for tLinearRegressionModel,
tLogisticRegressionModel, tKMeansStrModel
Merge branch 'maintenance/7.3' of github.com:Talend/tbd-studio-se into lbourgeois/tbd10921_spl30x_m73
Merge branch 'lbourgeois/tbd10921_spl30x_m73' of github.com:Talend/tbd-studio-se into lbourgeois/tbd10921_spl30x_m73

fix(TDQ-18964): Support Spark3 Local for tPredict when select
naiveBayesModel

timeline.bodyText: this is a duplicate part ABOUT scala-library-2.12.10.jar
timeline.author: msjian
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,771 @@
